attributes.action: Do everything necessary to ensure Britain withdraws from NATO, and expels all U.S. military personnel from British territory.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In view of all the atrocities,war crimes,crimes against humanity,and acts of terrorism committed by the U.S. over the past 56 years,(in Iran in 1953,in Nicaragua,Chile,El Salvador,Vietnam,Cambodia,Iraq,Diego Garcia,and elsewhere)it is high time that the U.K. distanced itself from the U.S. Empire.
Our country,like many other countries,needs to end the policy of appeasement towards America. 
The root cause of any danger we face from terrorists is the bad behaviour of America and its allies down the years, and the hatred that has engendered.
We are told that Al-Qaida terrorists want to destroy our way of life, but the truth is that Al-Qaida regards U.S. imperialism as its enemy
Al-Qaida is not interested in our way of life.
A country such as Norway, or Switzerland,is not under any threat from terrorism, despite the fact that their way of life is not so vastly different from ours.
It is to our country's great shame that it has connived in the U.S.agenda, which is 2-fold:--
1.To steal and exploit the resources of other nations.
2.To establish military bases wherever possible.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
